alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued January 08 at 3:37PM EST until January 10 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Significant coastal flooding possible. * WHERE...Coastal Charlotte and Coastal Lee Counties. * WHEN...From late Tuesday afternoon through Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads may be closed. Low lying property including homes, businesses, and some critical infrastructure may be inundated. Some shoreline erosion may occur. For portions of Charlotte and Lee counties, a worse case scenario is for water levels up to 2 feet above ground level.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
